articles.title: Tourist coins pose giant problem at N. Ireland's famous causeway site
articles.author: PAUL FAITH
articles.summary: Tourists are damaging Northern Ireland's Giant Causeway with their habit of wedging coins in cracks between the rocks. Authorities are urging them to keep their coins in their pockets to preserve the spectacular landscape. This page requires Javascript to be able to read it.
